message:
The place Mr. Haga marked turns out to be the entrance to an underground passage on the outskirts of the north quarter.

A collection of broken barricades has accumulated in front of it.
We find Mr. Haga there. He gives me a modified stun gun for self-defense.
According to him, the underground passage was used for transporting materials during Platinum Jail's construction.
The plan was originally for Platinum Jail to encompass the entire island, which is why the transport route extends to the Old Residential District.
With those plans halted, all that remains is this piece of infrastructure.
Though largely forgotten, the path will take us right to the front gate of Platinum Jail.
We move the barricades out of the way and head down the rusty stairs.
The tunnel is pitch black and seems to go on forever.
At the end, we find a staircase. And at the top... is a place the likes of which I've never seen before.
A giant white gate towers before us.
So this is the gate to Platinum Jail...
It's gotta be a trap, right?
Despite the doubts looming in my mind, we press on.
